• HTML forms no-nos – Alerts suck, really.
  • Good boss, bad boss – 2 kinds of bosses around, wondering which one am i..
  • Free e-book: Take your talent to the web – free book for beginner designers, pretty old (2001) but still holds some good grounds… i liked the nostalgic warm feeling it brought to my bones.
  • Refactoring CSS – important, it’s hard to keep your CSS organized right.
  • Ruby Tips – ohh… some good, some are not (avoid mephisto <== Fail)
